item.title: Experience #1
item.description:
Research assistant

  • During my academic journey, I have had the privilege of contributing to cutting-edge research projects under the guidance of Dr. Ian Flood. My work includes developing advanced computational models and leveraging machine learning techniques for real-world applications. I designed a transient pressure acoustic simulation neural network (NN) by integrating high-resolution simulation data from COMSOL Multiphysics, creating coarse-grained models to enhance performance while maintaining precision. Additionally, I developed an LSTM-based recurrent neural network (RNN) for analyzing bending moment data in weigh-in-motion systems, surpassing traditional machine learning approaches in accuracy and robustness. These experiences have honed my expertise in simulation modeling, data analysis, and the application of neural networks to solve complex engineering challenges.

item.title: Graziella Nutella
item.description: Working with this freelancer has been an exceptional experience. They consistently deliver high-quality work, demonstrating a keen eye for detail and a deep understanding of the project requirements. Their professionalism and commitment to excellence are evident in every task they undertake. They are not only skilled and knowledgeable but also incredibly reliable and easy to work with. I highly recommend this freelancer to anyone looking for top-tier talent and a dependable partner.

item.title: Dana Oneal
item.description: I had the pleasure of working with this freelancer on several projects, and their performance has been nothing short of outstanding. They bring a high level of expertise, creativity, and dedication to every task. Their ability to understand project requirements and deliver exceptional results on time is truly impressive. They are a reliable and proactive professional who consistently exceeds expectations. I highly recommend this freelancer to anyone seeking top-notch skills and a collaborative partner.

item.title: Ferdinand Shermand
item.description: Working with this colleague has been an absolute pleasure. Their dedication, professionalism, and positive attitude make them an invaluable asset to our team. They consistently go above and beyond to ensure that projects are completed on time and to the highest standard. Their ability to collaborate effectively and support their colleagues is truly commendable. I am continually impressed by their innovative thinking and problem-solving skills. This colleague is not just a team member but a true inspiration and a driving force behind our team’s success.

item.title: Fast transient pressure acoustic simulation NN
item.description: A project focused on simulating transient pressure acoustics using computational models and neural networks to study and predict sound propagation dynamics with high accuracy.

item.title: Bending moment generation
item.description: A package designed to generate bending moment data for structural analysis, leveraging influence line equations and customizable parameters for simulation and analysis.

item.title: BIM-Driven Engineering Building
item.description: This project focuses on leveraging Building Information Modeling (BIM) technologies to streamline the design and coordination of the new Engineering Building at the University of West Florida (UWF)

Sample blog content. Like a lorem ipsum but saying something more interesting.

item.title: Experience #2
item.description:
Research assistant

  • Developed a comprehensive design for a harbor coastal building to accommodate ships and mitigate the impact of sea waves. The project involved advanced hydrodynamic modeling to analyze wave propagation and optimize structural geometry for wave energy dissipation. Leveraged environmental impact assessments and engineering principles to ensure sustainable and resilient construction. Integrated innovative materials and construction techniques to enhance durability against harsh marine conditions, while ensuring compliance with international maritime and coastal engineering standards. This design effectively balanced functionality, environmental sustainability, and safety to support long-term harbor operations.

item.title: St. Augustine Airport Building - Base Bid “B”
item.description: Perform a detailed quantity takeoff for concrete, masonry, and metals divisions, and other divisions using RSMeans unit costs for St. Augustine-St. Johns County Airport Authority

item.title: Experience #3
item.description:
Site technician

  • Assisted in on-site data collection, including surveying and verifying measurements to ensure accuracy of construction plans.
  • Assist in preparing and maintaining construction project schedules using tools like Primavera.

item.title: Weigh-in-motion problem
item.description: Analyzing weigh-in-motion data using advanced machine learning models, enabling accurate vehicle classification and load assessment under dynamic conditions.
